definitions: the action or fact of marking a surface with a sharp or pointed object

examples.text: a screen protector prevents any scratching of the display

shortDefinitions: action or fact of marking a surface with a sharp object

definitions: the action of rubbing a part of one's body with one's fingernails

examples.text: scratching temporarily relieves an itch but it often makes a skin problem worse

shortDefinitions: action of rubbing part of body with fingernails

definitions: the action or sound of something being scraped over a hard surface

examples.text: there was near silence but for the scratching of pen on paper

shortDefinitions: action or sound something being scraped over hard surface

definitions: the action of playing a record using the scratch technique.

examples.text: the practices of rap and scratching

shortDefinitions: action of playing record using scratch technique
